Class GenericHibernateDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao.GenericHibernateDao<E,K>

    E - entity type
    K - entity key type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDao<E,K>
    Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class GenericHibernateDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericDao<E,K>
